1346571794057203712.name: Nebraskangooner
1346571794057203712.content:
Bull market tip:

If you put $50,000 into a Crypto and its value goes up 100%. You now have $100,000.

If its value goes up 200%, you now have $150,000.

Use this new knowledge wisely.
